entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [mono] Implement * and / quaternion intrinsics #82408
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Support single character wildcard in Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing #82406
  • [Mono]: Cleanup direct icall logic used in Mono AOT scenarios. #82405
  • Unify DNS resolution between Sockets and QUIC #82404
    8.0.0
  • Casting double to float returns strange number, with difference of nearly 8 units #82402
  • `ldelem` and `ldelema` check for negative array length #82401
  • polymorphic serialization/deserialization in System.Text.Json #82400
  • gentree.h (8125) - Assertion failed 'unreached' in 'System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86.X86Base:DivRem(uint,int,int):System.ValueTuple`2[int,int]' during 'LSRA allocate' #82397
    8.0.0
  • Run low level EventPipe and container type native tests on CI. #82396
  • F# typeof comparison suboptimal codegen #82394
    Future
  • [wasi] Respect `WASMTIME_PATH` #82391
    8.0.0
  • Fix NativeAOT ICU build integration for Apple mobile platforms #82389
    8.0.0

Closed

  • CodeDom generating wrong IL code under windows 11, which may casing AccessViolation exception #82377
  • HttpClient Hangs for Certain GET Requests with HTTP 1.1 #82327
  • Possible QuicConnection leak #80172
    8.0.0
  • QuicListener.AcceptConnectionAsync usability #77310
    8.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.DoCommand assertion failure during the repo build #81943
  • Test failure System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.UpgradeToGeneratedRegexAnalyzerTests.NoDiagnosticsForNet60(invocationType: StaticMethods) #81586
  • ProfileCastClassAndIsInst test failing on NativeAOT #82071
    8.0.0
  • PlaceSafepoints pass removed from LLVM #76936
    8.0.0
  • build v7.0.3 hit the error: error ST L1001: Unexpected compiler version, expected MSVC 19.34 or newer. #82229

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable constant folding in Tier0 #82412
  • Replace `SafeLocalAllocHandle` in `System.Net.HttpListener` #82411
  • [mono] Disable few quaternion intrinsics #82410
  • Update linux-instructions.md #82409
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add Microsoft.NET.ILLink package #82407
    linkable-framework, 8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Enable dedup on tvOS device + arm64 simulators #82403
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • POC for HttpRequestException error codes #82399
    NO-MERGE
  • Remove invalid internal attribute which causes warnings #82398
    test-enhancement, linkable-framework, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Deduplicate platform lists in BuildIntegration #82395
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Add System.Globalization.Native builds for iOS-like platforms #82393
    os-ios, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix generic parameter data flow validation in NativeAOT #82392
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][wasi] Bump wasmtime to 5.0.0 #82390
  • Annotation changes only (part 2) #82388
  • Add ability specify core_root when run #82387
    community-contribution
  • Allow wildcards when looking for nodes #82386
    community-contribution
  • Limit expansion in TemplateConstructableTypes #82385
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] others except coreclr #82382
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-vm and other directories in coreclr #82381
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-pal and coreclr-debug directories #82380
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-jit directory #82379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Remove fixed test from issues.targets #82378
  • Move SafeHandle debug-only _ctorStackTrace to not be first field #82376
    NO-REVIEW
  • SPMI: Indent details sections via CSS #82375

Merged

  • [Continuation] - Enable the fundamentals behind libraries tests compiled via Crossgen2 #80946
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Make more progress on IDE0044 ("Make field readonly") #82356
  • Use ArgumentOutOfRangeException throw helpers in a few more places #82357
  • Optimize ReplaceLineEndings #81630
    area-System.Runtime, 8.0.0
  • SPMI: Include example diffs in markdown summary #82364
  • [QUIC] Improved logic of listener AcceptConnection #82261
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix unitialized local in impCastClassOrIsInstToTree #82348
  • Revert "Revert Allow some intrinsics in Tier0" #82354
  • Unify type instantiations in reflection emit #81518
    area-System.Reflection
  • Update NativeAOT build integration targets to include ioslike platforms #82086
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Tiny speedup to HasGenericVirtualMethods #82383
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable EventPipe when EventSource is enabled #82200
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Convert a few more byte[]s to u8s #82358
  • Fix ISOSDacInterface::TraverseLoaderHeap #82371
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Updated

  • JIT: Lift remaining cmov restrictions by introducing GT_SELECTCC #82235
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2119012 #81871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • corehost: derive fallback rid from output rid. #82163
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup/VectorTableLookupExtension intrinsinsic + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [HTTP/3] Attempt at using newer image to allow H/3 Windows stress #82226
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • update msquic #81742
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Implement native container types used by shared EventPipe code. #78852
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [Mono]: Add support for lazy runtime init in native-to-managed wrapper, similar to NativeAOT library build. #82253
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add CollectionsMarshal.SetCount(list, count) #82146
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Adding more SIMD constant folding support #82190
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [wasm] Initial emscripten 3.1.30 support #81215
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Expose missing BinaryPrimitives APIs #82310
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Adding HelloiOS sample for NativeAOT #82249
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Add instrinsics for common Vector128 operations #81782
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add test that uses the host's fallback RID #82076
    area-Host
  • Fix loop hoisting float var profitability calculation #82352
  • [wasm][debugger] Test new chrome version. #82109
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] Install native dependencies on all Apple OS in CI #82322
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Install native dependencies on all Apple OS in CI #82323
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Enable SIMD #80797
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono][wasm] Fix ldftn in AOT mode, it should return a ftndesc. #82282
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • add source-build pre-built detection #82300
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Build test tree with partial trimming #82157
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Assist JIT in eliminating bounds checks #81036
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Optimize compare to `HexConverter.FromChar` result #81142
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Exclude things which broken on Loongarch #78850
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Run NativeAot tests on arm64 #82307
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [workloads] Bump net7 package version #82270
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Remove the EnumCalendarInfo workaround from the pinvoke table … #82362

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Dotnet format fails with EnforceCodeStyleInBuild enabled in 7.0.200 #30742
  • Build fails when using sdk version 7.0.201. #30735
  • What is the difference between dotnet SDK 7.0.103 and dotnet SDK 7.0.200 #30727

Closed

  • dotnet run fails: "The specified executable is not a valid application for this OS platform" #30565

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #30741
  • [GenAPI] Add DocIdExcludeListSymbolFilter for doc-id API exclusion. #30740
    Area-GenAPI
  • Enable debugging log #30732
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30731
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.9.2 to 19.10.0 in /eng/dependabot #30729
    dependencies

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #30713
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to enable a hotfix release #30712
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30706
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [GenAPI] Synthesize an internal default constructor for the type with implicit default constructor and the base type without. #30594
    Area-GenAPI
  • Revert MSBuild to match VS 17.5.0 GA #30674
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Allow multiple loggers for VSTest command #30686
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Enable Dependabot for branch release/7.0.3xx #30580
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2118671 #30714
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add tests for Nuget restore post action with the argument files #30693

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The SyntaxGenerator omits abstract modifier for event declarations #66966
  • Parameter Info may not be shown after a named argument #66962

Closed

  • MSBuild throws 'Cannot modify an evaluated object' #35760
    Backlog
  • Source decomipler shows the signature only #35192
    Backlog
  • Make VisualStudioMefHostServices public #34994
    Backlog
  • Wrong error messages displayed in Visual Studio #29937
    Backlog
  • ElasticTriviaFormatting does not insert line break after # directives #1847
    Backlog
  • VB IMethodXML does not handle array literals correctly #32339
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix flag value in option fallback reader #66967
  • Filter source generator diagnostics by `SuppressMessageAttribute` #66965
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Preserve empty NodeStateTable entries #66963
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators

Merged

  • Update IDE code to use list patterns. #66956
    Next

Updated

  • Results of running 'make member readonly' on roslyn #66955
  • Allow LSP code action requests to set the (new) AllowGenerateInHiddenCode option #66917
    Area-IDE
  • Results of running 'make member readonly' on IDE #66957
  • Add feature to suggest make struct members `readonly` #66954
  • Provide access to F# integration tests #66926
    Area-IDE
  • Add more using-alias-to-type tests #66889
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Layout for Component #46771
  • Blazor WebAssembly loading screen shows 101% loaded #46770
  • HubConnectionBuilder object fails to build in VS2022 plugin. #46767
  • Pipeline is executed when request isn't allowed by CORS policy #46766
  • Blazor IJSRuntime.Invoke memory leak problem #46761
  • Minimal API and OpenAPI: Datetime API Parameter Results In Plain String In OpenAPI Json #46759
  • System.InvalidOperationException: Collection was modified; enumeration operation may not execute in UseEndpoints. #46758
  • How can an existing assembly be read in Blazor WASM? #46754
  • gRPC JSON transcoding query string binding doesn't support directly converting known types #46753

Closed

  • Azure SignalR HubConnection does not trigger onClose when ios device locks #46720
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #46756
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #46757
  • Net 6.0 Razor Pages basic nagivation problem #46572
  • ASP.Net Identity Blazor: How to access `ClientId` and Client's `RedirectUris` from _Host.cshtml? #46565
  • Blazor server page code-behind retrieving query string parameters #46583
  • Can't pass headers from browser (typescript) to hub (.NET 7) #46749
  • Why does `/connect/authorize` use `/Identity/Account/Login` instead of `/Pages/Account/Login` and how to hide `"Use Another Service To Login"`? #46755
  • gRPC JSON transcoding query string binding doesn't support JSON names #46751

PullRequests

Created

  • Web.ProjectTemplates: exclude 'Program.cs' from all templates that replace it. #46769
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `376a7f3` to `a2880db` #46763
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `b73f27f` to `7a7231c` #46762
    area-infrastructure
  • Templates.Blazor.Tests: skip Playwright based tests when Playwright is not available. #46760
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] gRPC JSON transcoding: Fix known type messages in querystring values #46752
    area-grpc, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] gRPC JSON transcoding: Fix not supporting JSON name in querystring names #46750
    area-grpc, 7.0.x

Merged

  • Fix hanging response when nonstreaming rendering #46768
  • [blazor] startup sequence unification #46532
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview2
  • gRPC JSON transcoding: Fix known type messages in querystring values #46633
    area-grpc, 8.0-preview2

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Source-build: Allow setting KnownAppHostPack and KnownRuntimePack #46735
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • Dispose of old cancellationTokenSource instances during revalidation … #46736
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Expand FromX support and add route vs. query param inference #46715
    area-web-frameworks
  • Productize QuickGrid #46573
    area-blazor
  • Add WebViewManager.Dispatch() method #46644
    area-blazor, * NO MERGE *
  • Sections support #46727
    area-blazor
  • TryParse support for request delegate source generator #46696
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-20
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

    8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI Blazor on Windows 11 KB5022845: MainWindow 'white blick' #13461
  • [Debug]: The framework should break to warn user more efficient #13460
  • Core isolation #13459
  • Microsoft.Maui.Devices.Flashlight: Check if supported #13458
  • Certian markup causes CollectionView contents to vanish when updated #13457
  • Resizetizer is not working if you get a .DS_Store file inside you Fonts files folder #13452
  • [WinUI] [UIKit] CollectionView Items do not resize if the inner content changes. #13451
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio for Mac does not support setting TargetFramework settings for iOS/Mac Binding Libraries #13450

Closed

  • Error: System.Exception #13298
  • VMware #13219
  • [Windows][Picker] Background and BackgroundColour properties are not updating #13269
  • Element.OnChildRemoved() - Incorrect variable used in function. #12633
    Backlog
  • great bug report #13439

PullRequests

Merged

  • Geolocation: Add #nullable for Essentials Geolocation code #13371
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Switch to net7.0 as prev version (#13447) #13448

Updated

  • Simplification of user interface declaration in code #12728
    proposal/open, community ✨
  • Shell routing and Service registration automation #13402
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Fix e-mail URI escaping recipients #13392
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [Windows] Notify changes in CollectionView Layouts #13137
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • Implement Keyboard on SearchBarHandler #9851
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Windows] Add helper method to get GetFirstChildOfType with null support. #13421
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Fix Button LineBreakMode property #10759
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [macOS/iOS] Fix RequestedThemeChanged event #11199
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Housekeeping] Port latest fixes from Xamarin.Forms to .NET MAUI #11420
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Avoid crash using BoxView visibility (avoid unnecessary parent) #11439
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] Fix issue correctly updating WrapperView content visibility #11531
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • [iOS] Fix SearchBar focus issues #11698
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Fix gestures in Label Spans #12027
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • [Housekeeping] Alternative to #11795 #12134
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Allow to update Entry Background (once established) #12227
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮
  • [Android & iOS] Use the correct colors by themes with Alerts on Android and iOS #13318
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/theme
  • [Android & iOS] Fix focus issues with DatePicker and TimePicker #13321
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • [iOS] Fix Border Content clipping issues #10964
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Bump System.Text.Json from 7.0.1 to 7.0.2 #13358
    do-not-merge, area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #13434
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Json Column in EF Core translate my UTF-8 character to something like \u7BA1 #30316
  • Json column has different support for Chinese in addition and editing #30315
  • MissingMethodException: Method not found: 'Void CoreTypeMappingParameters..ctor(System.Type, Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Storage.ValueConversion.ValueConverter, Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ChangeTracking.ValueComparer, Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ChangeTracking.ValueComparer, System.Func`3<Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IProperty,Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IEntityType,Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ValueGeneration.ValueGenerator>)'. #30313
  • Warn on using HashSet with mutated hash code, or similar broken collections #30312

Closed

  • Support sequence key generation on SQL Server, which is useful for Table-per-concrete-type (TPC) mappings #28096
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Updated

  • Fix to #28816 - Json: add support for Sqlite provider #30302

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-20
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [WIP][DO NOT MERGE] Improve default README of the VMR Codespace #15592
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #15590

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #15576
  • Increase branding version and downgrade implicit version to enable hotfix release #15587
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #15583
  • Change how VS setup authoring is configured. #15552
